# 1.0.1 - 2018.01.28

### New

- Save to file feature
- Get image as base64
- GS1 codes added:
	- 3900-3909
	- 415
	- 8020
	- 96
	
### Improvements

- System requirements added to composer (gd/imagettftext)
- Compoer install info added to readme
